Package application

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Booking
    This class is used to populate the bookings TableView in the customer profile.
    CBookingConfirmationController
    This class is the controller for the CBookingConfirmation page
    CBookingController
    This class is the controller for the CBooking page
    CDayPjController
    This class is the controller for the CDayPj page
    CHomeController
    This class is the controller for the CHomeController page
    CMyBookingsController
    This class is the controller for the CMyBookings page
    CRateMoviesController
    This class is the controller for the CRateMovies page
    CUpdateProfileController
    This class is the controller for the CUpdateProfile page
    Database
    This class is responsible for the connection with the database and all the queries that we need for our application.
    EAddMovieController
    This class allows employees to add new movies to the system.
    EAddProjectionController
    This class allows employees to upload new projections for any existing movie.
    EBookingController
    This class gives the employee access to the cinema room representation for a given projection time.
    ECinemaRoomController
    This class gives the employee access to this available and booked seats for a given projection.
    EHomeController
    This class uses methods to give the employee access to all the functionalities required in this cinema booking system.
    EMovieAddProjectionController
    This class contains methods and fields to display add a new projection for a given movie, directly from this movie poage.
    EMovieController
    This class uses methods to display all the information relative to this selected movie from the comboBox in the previous page.
    ERatingsListController
    This class uses methods to display the ratings of each movie.
    LoginController
    This class is the controller for the Login page
    Main
    This is the Main class of this cinema booking system.
    Projection
    This class is used to populate the CBooking TableView in the customer profile.
    Rating  
    Tester
